T02TD1357E:80a-1: shra'i na ksha tra mandala s'a dha na me ka da sam ga n'a ma /
T02TD1357E:80a-3: dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD1357E:80a-4: dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1357E:80a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku //
T02TD1357E:80a-6: nyin mong byed pa'i 'od lta bu //
T02TD1357E:80a-8: sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa //
T02TD1357E:80a-9: lha yi mchog la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1357E:80a-10: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1357E:80a-11: rgyu skar dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bri //
T02TD1357E:80a-12: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis //
T02TD1357E:80a-13: rgyud nas bshad pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD1357E:80a-14: rten dang yo byad bsags nas ni //
T02TD1357E:80a-15: dngos grub yan lag bcu gcig bsgom //
T02TD1357E:80a-16: bsrung dang kha dog dag pa dang //
T02TD1357E:80a-17: bdag nyid dag bya bdag bsrung dang //
T02TD1357E:80a-18: tshogs gnyis bsags dang dkyil 'khor bskyed //
T02TD1357E:80a-19: byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang //
T02TD1357E:80a-20: phra mo'i thig le'i rnal 'byor dang //
T02TD1357E:80a-21: mchod bstod rjes kyi bya ba'o //
T02TD1357E:80a-22: cho ga de dag re re la'ang //
T02TD1357E:80a-23: cho ga dang ni ting 'dzin dang /
T02TD1357E:80a-24: nga rgyal bzung ba gsum gsum mo //
T02TD1357E:80a-25: dang por tho rangs sngar langs nas //
T02TD1357E:80a-26: nam mkha'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02TD1357E:80a-27: rol mos gnyid bsangs pa ru bsam //
T02TD1357E:80a-29: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i na ma: k'a ya b'aktsitta pra na me banda nam ka ro y'a mi /
T02TD1357E:80a-30: de nas khams bsang mandala bya //
T02TD1357E:80a-31: me tog tshom bu lha grangs bzhin //
T02TD1357E:80a-32: sku gsungs thugs kyi rten yang dgod //
T02TD1357E:80a-33: mchod pa rnams dang rol mo dang //
T02TD1357E:80a-34: gtor ma dag kyang bsham par bya //
T02TD1357E:80a-35: bdag nyid rdo rje shugs su bsgom //
T02TD1357E:80a-36: spyi bo sogs su yi ge dgod //
T02TD1357E:80a-37: rdo rje bsams la bka' bsgo ba //
T02TD1357E:80a-38: h'um lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1357E:80a-39: bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon //
T02TD1357E:80a-40: nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs //
T02TD1357E:80a-41: srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor ba //
T02TD1357E:80b-1: sku gsum las byung dags [?] par bya //
T02TD1357E:80b-2: gal te dam tshig las 'das na //
T02TD1357E:80b-4: rdo rje 'bar ba bde chen po //
T02TD1357E:80b-5: ye shes 'byung ba'i las rtsom gyis //
T02TD1357E:80b-6: brjes byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs //
T02TD1357E:80b-7: gnas 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs //
T02TD1357E:80b-8: rdo rje rnams las med dpung 'bar //
T02TD1357E:80b-9: sngags 'dis bgegs rnams sreg par byed //
T02TD1357E:80b-10: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: hr'a: hr'a: hr'a: hr'a: ra ra ra ra /
T02TD1357E:80b-11: badzr'a na las rbb'a ba ra na dha rmm'a p'a la ya sva bh'a ba m'a ra ka yi ka bighn'am bi n'a ya k'a d'i n'am /
T02TD1357E:80b-12: da sha di ka ga t'a n'am k'a ya b'aktsitta n'i /
T02TD1357E:80b-15: bha sm'im ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1357E:80b-16: ces pas bdud rnams sreg par bsam //
T02TD1357E:80b-17: aom a'a: h'um ra badzra tsandra s'u rya r'a hu la k'a la aagn'a ya: k'a ya b'a ktsi tt'a dzny'ana badzra pr'a k'a ran ku ruku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-18: zhas pas sna tshogs rdo rje yis //
T02TD1357E:80b-19: bdag nyid sa dang rtsig pa bzhi //
T02TD1357E:80b-20: steng du mda' yi dra ba ni //
T02TD1357E:80b-21: tho rangs grib ma'i bar du bsgom //
T02TD1357E:80b-22: yang na gnam sa 'byor bar ro //
T02TD1357E:80b-23: aom h'um ba sha k'a ya badzra k'u d'a g'a ram ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-24: zhes pas me dpung ra ba bsgom //
T02TD1357E:80b-25: aom h'am y'am r'am b'am l'am badzr'a k'a sha b'a yu te dza au da ka pri thi b'i badzra sva bh'a ba phanytsa dh'a tu bhu badzra mandala ni ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-26: 'byung ba lnga brtsegs gyur pa las //
T02TD1357E:80b-27: rab gsum ldan gzhal yas khang/ g //
T02TD1357E:80b-28: dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsam //
T02TD1357E:80b-29: aom pa: bi shva badzra padmam ku ruku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-30: aom ra: badzra s'u ry'a sa na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-31: zhes pas gdan rnams bsam par bya //
T02TD1357E:80b-32: aom h'um kro dhe ndro & ham kro dh'a n'am aa dzny'a d'a ya ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-33: dbus su rdo rje shugs khro bo //
T02TD1357E:80b-35: aom ham badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a au shn'i sho aurda di shi raksh'am ku ruku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-36: aom yam badzra kro dha r'a dza aa te bi la bighn'a nta k'a p'u rba di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-37: aom ra badzra kro dha r'a dza dzam ba ka du shta pradzny'a nta ka dakshi na di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-38: aom wam badzra kro dha r'a dza man ka bi r'a ga padm'a nta ka autta ra di shi raksh'a ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-39: aom lam badzra kro dha r'a dza stam bha ka ya m'anta ka pa shtsi ma di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:80b-40: aom l'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a ba la b'a ya by'a di shi raksh'a ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-0: aom w'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza aa tsa @81a * //
T02TD1357E:81a-1: la a'i sha na di shi rksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-2: aom r'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza takki nee rri hy'am di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-3: aom y'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza n'i la danda agne yy'am di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-4: aom h'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza sum bha aa dho di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-5: sngar gyi rdo rje shugs kyi ni //
T02TD1357E:81a-6: dbang po'i pu ga so so las //
T02TD1357E:81a-7: khro bo bcu dag spros nas ni //
T02TD1357E:81a-8: rang rang phyogs su gdan dgod do //
T02TD1357E:81a-11: sngar bzhin bzad par bcu yang spro //
T02TD1357E:81a-12: thugs kyi ra ba'i phyi rol bsrung //
T02TD1357E:81a-14: dzhi dzh'i dhri dhr'i bhu bh'u dhl'i dhla'i /
T02TD1357E:81a-15: de bzhin phyos skyong bcu yang spros //
T02TD1357E:81a-16: gsung gi ra ba'i nang du bsrung /
T02TD1357E:81a-22: de bzhin gza' bcu spros nas ni //
T02TD1357E:81a-23: de yi phyi rol bkod la bsrung //
T02TD1357E:81a-29: de bzhin klu rgyal bcu yang spro //
T02TD1357E:81a-30: sku yi ra ba'i nang du bsrung //
T02TD1357E:81a-33: tri tr'i pu p'u dli dl'i /
T02TD1357E:81a-34: 'byung po bcu yang spros nas ni //
T02TD1357E:81a-35: de yi phyi rol bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD1357E:81a-36: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta raksha tsa kra sba bh'a b'atma ko nya ham /
T02TD1357E:81a-37: sngags kyis nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1357E:81a-38: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i yan lag ste dang po'o /
T02TD1357E:81a-40: // / bdud rtsi lnga dang stobs lnga yi //
T02TD1357E:81a-41: ri lu sran chung tshad tsam bya //
T02TD1357E:81a-42: yam ram kam go ku da ha na bi mu mar shu /
T02TD1357E:81a-43: rlung me thod par bcu po bsam //
T02TD1357E:81a-44: aom aom badzra tsandra sarbba dharmma: su bi shuddha: sva bh'a ba sarba dha rm'a nbi sho dh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-45: zla ba aom gyis dag par bya //
T02TD1357E:81a-46: aom a'a: s'u rya sarbba dha rmm'a spra bo dh'a ka sarbba dha rmm'a pra bo dh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-47: nyi ma a'a: yi 'od kyis spel //
T02TD1357E:81a-48: aom h'um badzr'a na la sarbba dha rmm'a pra d'i pa k'a sarbba dharmm'a na pra d'i pa k'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-49: sgra gcan h'um gis 'bar bar bya //
T02TD1357E:81a-50: aom ho: sarbba dha rmm'a badzr'a mri ta ka ra sarbba dha rmm'a na badzra aa mri ta ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-51: dus me ho: yis bdud rtsir bsam //
T02TD1357E:81a-52: rang nyid lce rtse h'um yig las //
T02TD1357E:81a-54: bdud rtsi bkug ste myangs par bsam /
T02TD1357E:81a-55: aom sarbba b'i ra yo gi n'i pra na y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81a-56: gtsug tor steng du pam las ni //
T02TD1357E:81a-57: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje dkar //
T02TD1357E:81a-58: bam gyis mtshan pa zhi rgyas la //
T02TD1357E:81a-59: las gzhan dag pa nye sogs sbyar //
T02TD1357E:81a-60: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: pra dznyo p'a ya /
T02TD1357E:81a-61: a'a tma ka k'a ya b'a kci tta dzny'ana /
T02TD1357E:81b-0: ma ma k'a ya b'a ktsi tta badzr'am badzr'a @81b mri tam sv'a bh'a bam /
T02TD1357E:81b-1: ku ru ku ru skandha dh'a tu ya t'a n'am ni :sv'a bh'a bam sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81b-2: rdo rje la sogs zhu ba'i chus //
T02TD1357E:81b-3: lus kyi dri ma thams cad dor //
T02TD1357E:81b-4: zhi ba zla ba lta bur dkar la dag par bsgom //
T02TD1357E:81b-5: las gzhan rang rang kha dog go //
T02TD1357E:81b-6: aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddha: sarbba dharmma: sv'a bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1357E:81b-7: des dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1357E:81b-8: kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1357E:81b-10: // / bdag nyid dus 'khor zhal gcig pa //
T02TD1357E:81b-11: phyag gnyis yum dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1357E:81b-12: dpral bar aom las snang mtha' yas //
T02TD1357E:81b-13: mgrin par a'a: las rin 'byung bsam //
T02TD1357E:81b-14: snying gar h'um las don yod grub /
T02TD1357E:81b-15: lte bar ho: las rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1357E:81b-16: gtsug tor ham las mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1357E:81b-17: gsang bar ksha: las rdo rje sems //
T02TD1357E:81b-18: rigs drug po ni dgod par bya //
T02TD1357E:81b-19: aa ai ri au li aa ae aar aao aal ha ya ra wal /
T02TD1357E:81b-20: lag g-yon sor mo'i tshigs gsum la'o //
T02TD1357E:81b-22: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
T02TD1357E:81b-23: g-yas pa'i sor mo tshigs gsum la dgod /
T02TD1357E:81b-24: aom hra: sarbba shada r'a dz'a m'a ra kle sha aandha ka ra /
T02TD1357E:81b-25: badzra t'i kshan du: kha tstshe da ma ma kar bi shuddh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81b-26: las pa'i ye ge rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD1357E:81b-27: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha:/
T02TD1357E:81b-28: k'a ya b'a ktsi tta aa dhi pa ti /
T02TD1357E:81b-29: badzra k'a ya ma ma k'a ya b'a ktsi tta dzny'a na badzra badzra k'a ya sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:81b-30: mdzes pa'i phyag rgya kun du reg / rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus su bsam //
T02TD1357E:81b-31: aom sarbba ta th'a gta badzra k'a ya sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:81b-32: rdo rje'i lus kyi nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1357E:81b-33: bdag dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD1357E:81b-35: // / de nas lag pa thal sbyar te //
T02TD1357E:81b-36: aom hrl'am hri da ya na ma /
T02TD1357E:81b-37: aom hrl'am shi ri si wo shata /
T02TD1357E:81b-38: aom hrl'im shi kha ya wa shata /
T02TD1357E:81b-39: aom hrlum ka ba tsa ya h'um /
T02TD1357E:81b-40: aom hram ne tra boo shata /
T02TD1357E:81b-42: go cha dang ni mtshon cha'o //
T02TD1357E:81b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya shi ra si si kha:ka ba tsanee tra aashta badzra sha d'am ga sva bh'am b'atam ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:81b-44: zhse pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1357E:81b-45: go cha'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1357E:81b-48: // / rang gi snying gar pam las ni //
T02TD1357E:81b-49: padma a'a: las zla ba'i steng //
T02TD1357E:81b-50: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02TD1357E:81b-51: 'od zer lnga ldan phyogs bcur spro //
T02TD1357E:81b-52: bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal sras rnams //
T02TD1357E:81b-53: spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs //
T02TD1357E:81b-54: 'od zer slar yang snying gar bsdu //
T02TD1357E:81b-55: zla dkyil ka sogs sde tshan drug /
T02TD1357E:82a-0: @82a * // ring thung brtsegs pa bcu gnyis las //
T02TD1357E:82a-1: mchod rdzas lha mor gyur pa spro //
T02TD1357E:82a-2: aom tstsha badzra gandahe aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-3: aom tstshdzdzhny'a badzra m'a le m'a la aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-4: aom tashddhna badzra h'um pe dh'u pe dh'u pa aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-5: aom tathddhn'a badzra pra d'i pe pra d'i pa aa rtsa nam ku ru ku sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-6: aom pphpphhma badzra mri te nee bi dya p'u dz'i ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-7: aom pphbbhm'a badzra aaksha te aaksha ta pha la aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-8: aom tthddhna badzra l'a sya bstra a'a ba ra na p'u dz'i ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-9: aom tthddhn'a badzra ha sye gha nt'a da rsha p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-10: aom kkhgghnga badzra w'a dye w'a dye p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-11: aom kkhggh'a badzra nri dye nri dya ph'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-12: aom sgpshshthka badzra g'i te g'i ta p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-13: aom schpshshak'a badzra k'a me sarbba bu ddh'a bo dhi satb'a n'am badzra su ra ta p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1357E:82a-14: sna tshogs mchod pa byas te sdig pa rnam pa mang po bshags bgyis la //
T02TD1357E:82a-15: sgrub pa pos ni lus dang ngag yid dang bas gsum la gus su mchi bar bgyi //
T02TD1357E:82a-16: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs dge ba gang byas pa yi dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1357E:82a-17: dge dag kun la rjes su yi rang nas ni sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su 'jug / sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing mya ngan na mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
T02TD1357E:82a-18: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dag la byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1357E:82a-19: 'di ni sems can don phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag 'gyur smon lam gdab par bgyi //
T02TD1357E:82a-20: bsod nams rtsa ba gsum sogs dran //
T02TD1357E:82a-21: ye shes tshogs ni stong nyid bsgom //
T02TD1357E:82a-22: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad ni //
T02TD1357E:82a-23: dngos dang bral bas stong pa nyid //
T02TD1357E:82a-24: rgyu las 'das pas mtshan ma med //
T02TD1357E:82a-25: 'bras bu med pas smon pa med //
T02TD1357E:82a-27: aom sh'u nya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:82a-28: aom aa ni mi tta dzny'ana badzra sv'a bh'a b'atam ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:82a-29: aom aa pra ti ha ta dzny'ana badzra sva vh'a b'a tma ka nya ham /
T02TD1357E:82a-30: aom aa na bha'i sam sk'a ra dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham //
T02TD1357E:82a-31: rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs //
T02TD1357E:82a-33: aom aa na bh'i sam sk'a ra dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:82a-34: rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs //
T02TD1357E:82a-35: thig le'i bdag nyid skar mda' bzhin //
T02TD1357E:82a-36: rim pas bsdus te 'dzin med par //
T02TD1357E:82b-0: se chu me rlung nam mkha'i @82b khams //
T02TD1357E:82b-1: rang bzhin zhugs pas yul dang bral //
T02TD1357E:82b-2: kun gzhi rnam shes 'od gsal bsgom //
T02TD1357E:82b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sh'u nya t'a dzny'ana badzra sv'a bh'a b'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:82b-4: de yis nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1357E:82b-5: tshogs gnyis bas gsags pa'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD1357E:82b-7: // / de nas stong nyid ngang las ni //
T02TD1357E:82b-8: nyi steng sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-9: rdo rje dra gur rtsibs bcu yi //
T02TD1357E:82b-10: lte ba aa las chos 'byung ngo //
T02TD1357E:82b-19: rlung gnag zlum po rgyal mtshan can //
T02TD1357E:82b-20: me dmar gru gsum g-yung drung mtshan //
T02TD1357E:82b-21: chu dkar zlum po padmas mtshan //
T02TD1357E:82b-22: sa ser gru bzhi 'khor los mtshan //
T02TD1357E:82b-23: de dag steng dang 'og tu yang //
T02TD1357E:82b-24: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya gram mo //
T02TD1357E:82b-25: de steng lhun po kha khyer ldan //
T02TD1357E:82b-26: nyi zla padma sgra gcan bcas //
T02TD1357E:82b-27: de steng aom mam bhr'um las ni //
T02TD1357E:82b-28: gzhal yas khang brtsegs mchod rten ni //
T02TD1357E:82b-29: rin chen dang bzhin gru bzhi ni //
T02TD1357E:82b-30: rin chen snam bu pha gu dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-31: dra ba dra phyed mda' yab dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-32: sgo dang rta babs bcu gnyis dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-36: snying po ye shes 'dab ma dag / rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02TD1357E:82b-37: phyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1357E:82b-38: pad sogs ka ba bcu drug dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-39: chu skyes rdo rjer bas mdzes //
T02TD1357E:82b-40: lha yi snam bu dag gis bskor //
T02TD1357E:82b-41: de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1357E:82b-42: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa brgyad //
T02TD1357E:82b-43: padma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor //
T02TD1357E:82b-44: phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD1357E:82b-45: pad 'dab bzhi brgyad bcu drug pa //
T02TD1357E:82b-46: bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1357E:82b-47: phyi rol gling ni bcu gnyis dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-48: nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-49: chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che //
T02TD1357E:82b-50: rnga bo che dang byang chub shing //
T02TD1357E:82b-51: rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1357E:82b-52: dbus kyi padma'i lte ba'i steng //
T02TD1357E:82b-53: zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-54: bdud dang drag po yab yum dang //
T02TD1357E:82b-55: bdud ni gdong gcig kha dog dmar //
T02TD1357E:82b-56: lag bzhi mda' dang lcags kyu g-yas /
T02TD1357E:82b-57: g-yon pas gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin //
T02TD1357E:82b-58: yum ni dga' mo dang bcas g-yas //
T02TD1357E:82b-59: drag po gdong gsum mdog dmar po //
T02TD1357E:82b-60: g-yon pas thod pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02TD1357E:82b-61: au ma'i yum bcas g-yon du gdeng //
T02TD1357E:82b-62: de steng mngon par byang chub pa //
T02TD1357E:83a-4: ha ya ra wal aom a'a:l'a b'a r'a y'a ha /
T02TD1357E:83a-5: a'a la aoo aar aee a'a /
T02TD1357E:83a-7: zla ba yi ges mtshan pa ste //
T02TD1357E:83a-8: me long ye shes dag pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-9: lla wwa yya dda dhda lla wwa rra yya rra hha ss wwa shsha shsha thakthak /
T02TD1357E:83a-23: nyi ma yi ges mtshan pa 'og / mnyam nyid ye shes gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-24: khar ka du dri za'i yi ge h'um //
T02TD1357E:83a-25: so so rtag pa gsum pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-26: hi yig gcig gyur rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD1357E:83a-27: bya grub ye shes bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-28: phat kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD1357E:83a-29: chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-30: gtso bo sku mdog sngon po la //
T02TD1357E:83a-31: kha dog phyogs bzhi dag tu gsungs //
T02TD1357E:83a-32: zhal bzhi phyag ni nyer bzhi pa //
T02TD1357E:83a-33: mgrin gsum zhabs gnyis brkyang bzhugs pa //
T02TD1357E:83a-34: dbus zhal mthing ga mche gtsigs drag / g-yas pa dmar po chags pa che //
T02TD1357E:83a-35: g-yon pa dkar po zhi ba'i zhal //
T02TD1357E:83a-36: rgyab ni ser po ting nge 'dzin bzhugs //
T02TD1357E:83a-37: ral pa'i thor tshugs bcu gnyis spyan //
T02TD1357E:83a-38: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba phyed dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-39: rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-40: glang chen stag lpags na bza' can //
T02TD1357E:83a-41: mgrin gsum gnag dmar dkar po'o //
T02TD1357E:83a-42: dpung pa drug ni sngo dmar dkar //
T02TD1357E:83a-43: phyag ngar bcu gnyis de bzhin no //
T02TD1357E:83a-44: phyag mgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni //
T02TD1357E:83a-45: gnag dmar dkar po'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1357E:83a-46: mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu //
T02TD1357E:83a-47: ser dkar dmar gnag snga bzhin no //
T02TD1357E:83a-48: tshigs kyi phreng bsngo dmar dkar //
T02TD1357E:83a-49: rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-50: gri gug mda' dang lcags kyu dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-51: da ru tho ba 'khor lo ma dung //
T02TD1357E:83a-52: dbyug pa dgra sta g-yas pas 'dzin //
T02TD1357E:83a-53: dril bu phub dang kha tv'am ga / thod pa gzhu dang zhags dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-54: rin chen pad dkar dung dang ni //
T02TD1357E:83a-55: me long lcags sgrog tshangs mgo g-yon //
T02TD1357E:83a-56: cod pan snyan cha mgul rgyan dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-57: gdu bu dpung rgyan ska rags dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-58: zhabs gdub rnams ni rdo rjes brgyan //
T02TD1357E:83a-59: mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal dang //
T02TD1357E:83a-60: thal ba phreng ba gtsug nor bu //
T02TD1357E:83a-61: klu chen bcu yis de bzhin brgyan //
T02TD1357E:83b-0: g-yon dkar @83b g-yas dmar brkyang ba'i zhabs //
T02TD1357E:83b-1: yum ser zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma //
T02TD1357E:83b-2: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar rgya ba zhal gnag / gri gug lcag skyu da ma ru //
T02TD1357E:83b-3: phreng ba g-yas pas 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1357E:83b-4: thod pa zhags pa padma dang //
T02TD1357E:83b-5: rin chen nor bu g-yon na 'dzin //
T02TD1357E:83b-6: rgyan rnams gtso bo dag dang mthun //
T02TD1357E:83b-8: de nas 'khor lo drug po la //
T02TD1357E:83b-9: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: dgod //
T02TD1357E:83b-10: de nas 'gro drug sems can rnams //
T02TD1357E:83b-11: bkug nas dkyil 'khor de la gzhug / yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs te //
T02TD1357E:83b-12: snyoms 'jug sgra yis rnam snang sogs //
T02TD1357E:83b-13: nang du bkug nas bzhugs par bsam //
T02TD1357E:83b-14: yab yum byang chub sems kyis ni //
T02TD1357E:83b-15: bha gar de la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1357E:83b-16: sems can de rnams dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD1357E:83b-17: zhal gsum phyag drug sogs su gyur //
T02TD1357E:83b-18: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD1357E:83b-19: mchog dga'i bde pas gang par bsam //
T02TD1357E:83b-22: ksha kshe ksh'a ra ksho ksha la ksham:/
T02TD1357E:83b-23: ksh'a kshee ksh'ar kshoo ksha la ksh'am:/
T02TD1357E:83b-26: de sogs lus kyi dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD1357E:83b-27: phyung la dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya //
T02TD1357E:83b-28: spyi mgrin snying gar aom a'a:h'um /
T02TD1357E:83b-29: gtsug tor ham bsam lte ba ru //
T02TD1357E:83b-31: rab 'bar gtso bo yab yum gnyis //
T02TD1357E:83b-32: bde chen 'od du zhu ba las //
T02TD1357E:83b-33: tshad med bzhi yi lha mo'i glus //
T02TD1357E:83b-34: 'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pas bskul //
T02TD1357E:83b-35: spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma //
T02TD1357E:83b-36: rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas //
T02TD1357E:83b-37: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1357E:83b-38: dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod //
T02TD1357E:83b-39: bdag ni sring mo m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1357E:83b-40: rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas //
T02TD1357E:83b-41: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1357E:83b-42: dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod //
T02TD1357E:83b-43: gos dkar bdag ni bu mo ste //
T02TD1357E:83b-44: rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bu'i gnas //
T02TD1357E:83b-45: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1357E:83b-46: dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod //
T02TD1357E:83b-47: sgrol ma bdag ni cha mo ste //
T02TD1357E:83b-48: rnal 'byor pa yi dri med gnas //
T02TD1357E:83b-49: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1357E:83b-50: dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod //
T02TD1357E:83b-51: lha mos glu mdzad bcom ldan khyod //
T02TD1357E:83b-52: sems can kun la phan mdzad pa //
T02TD1357E:84a-2: lha mo'i bla mas 'dod can 'dod pa mdzad do bzhengs //
T02TD1357E:84a-3: de ltar bskul ba gsan nas ni //
T02TD1357E:84a-4: chos sku stong pa'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD1357E:84a-5: mig 'phrul lta bur bzhengs mdzad de //
T02TD1357E:84a-6: h'um phrem spro ning bskul bas zhu //
T02TD1357E:84a-7: rdo rje dang ni gri gug h'um du 'gyur //
T02TD1357E:84a-8: de bzhin gtso po yab yum bzhengs //
T02TD1357E:84a-9: de nas 'khor gyi lha spror phyir //
T02TD1357E:84a-10: rdo rje padmar byin brlabs la //
T02TD1357E:84a-11: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug sgras //
T02TD1357E:84a-12: chos kyi dbyings nas sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1357E:84a-13: bkug la yab kyi zhal du thim /
T02TD1357E:84a-14: bhag gnas brgyud yum gyis ni //
T02TD1357E:84a-15: padmar zhugs te bha gar brgyud //
T02TD1357E:84a-16: yum gyi zhal nas yab zhal du //
T02TD1357E:84a-17: zhugs nas yab kyi rdo rje nas //
T02TD1357E:84a-18: sa bon yul gyi padma ru //
T02TD1357E:84a-19: yi ge spros nas phyogs phyogs gnas //
T02TD1357E:84a-20: de nas phyag mtshan de las sku //
T02TD1357E:84a-21: de la phyir spros gdan la dgod //
T02TD1357E:84a-22: aa dang rdo rje las gyur pa //
T02TD1357E:84a-23: mi bskyod zhal gsum phyag drug sngo //
T02TD1357E:84a-24: spros nas slar yang gtso la thim //
T02TD1357E:84a-25: rdo rje dbyings phyug sku mdog sngo //
T02TD1357E:84a-26: spros nas slar yang gtso mor thim //
T02TD1357E:84a-27: snying po ye shes 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1357E:84a-28: chu skyes 'dab brgyad zla ba'i steng /
T02TD1357E:84a-29: aa a'a aam aa: ha h'a kham ha:/
T02TD1357E:84a-30: lha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad de //
T02TD1357E:84a-31: shar du nag mo 'bar ma ste //
T02TD1357E:84a-32: sku dang mdun gyi zhal mthun gnag / g-yas dmar g-yon dkar rgyab ser zhal //
T02TD1357E:84a-33: sbos dang tsandan gur gum snod //
T02TD1357E:84a-34: glu ba ga bur ldan snod g-yas //
T02TD1357E:84a-35: dril bu padma lha shing gi / me tog dang ni phreng ba g-yon //
T02TD1357E:84a-36: nub tu ser 'bar mdun zhal ser //
T02TD1357E:84a-37: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar rgyab sngon zhal //
T02TD1357E:84a-38: dung dang nor bu gling bu dang //
T02TD1357E:84a-39: da ma ru ni phyag g-yas na //
T02TD1357E:84a-40: pi wang rgyud mngas dang ni mda' //
T02TD1357E:84a-41: dril bu khrol ba rang g-yon na //
T02TD1357E:84a-42: byang du dkar 'bar dbus zhal dkar //
T02TD1357E:84a-43: g-yas ga nag g-yon ser rgyab zhal dmar //
T02TD1357E:84a-44: 'o ma'i snod dang chu snod dang //
T02TD1357E:84a-45: lha yi sman dang chang snod g-yas //
T02TD1357E:84a-46: bdud rtsi'i snod dang grub pa'i bcud //
T02TD1357E:84a-48: lho ru dmar 'bar dbus zhal dmar //
T02TD1357E:84a-49: g-yas ser g-yon sngo rgyab dkar zhal //
T02TD1357E:84a-50: mar me mu tig do shal dang /
T02TD1357E:84a-51: cod pan du bu phyag g-yas na /
T02TD1357E:84a-52: na bza' dang ni sku regs dang /
T02TD1357E:84a-55: shar lhor du ba na ga no dang //
T02TD1357E:84b-0: nub byang mar me @84b ser mo dang //
T02TD1357E:84b-1: byang shar mkha' gsal dkar mo dang //
T02TD1357E:84b-2: lho nub smig rgyu dmar po bzhi //
T02TD1357E:84b-3: zhal ni phyogs bzhi'i lha mo mtshungs //
T02TD1357E:84b-4: phyag brgyad thams cad rnga yab bsnams //
T02TD1357E:84b-5: mnyam brkyang ba yi stabs kyis bzhugs //
T02TD1357E:84b-6: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yab //
T02TD1357E:84b-7: yum ni padma'i bzhugs stabs so ;
T02TD1357E:84b-8: / mtshams kyi gru chad bzhi dag la //
T02TD1357E:84b-10: chos kyi dung dkar byang shar du //
T02TD1357E:84b-11: gand'i dmar po lho nub mtshams //
T02TD1357E:84b-12: shar lhor yid bzhin nor bu gnag / dpag bsam shing ser byang nub bo //
T02TD1357E:84b-13: 'dod ma log ma bdun cu gnyis //
T02TD1357E:84b-14: phyogs na bco brgyad 'gyid bag can //
T02TD1357E:84b-15: 'khyud pa'i stobs kyis phyag sbrel nas //
T02TD1357E:84b-16: kha khyer la gnas mchod par byed //
T02TD1357E:84b-17: de nas thugs kyi padma la //
T02TD1357E:84b-18: phyogs la nyi ma'i gdan dag la //
T02TD1357E:84b-20: shar du don yod grub pa gnag / lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan dmar //
T02TD1357E:84b-21: byang du snang ba mtha' yas dkar //
T02TD1357E:84b-22: nub tu rnam par snang mdzad ser //
T02TD1357E:84b-23: mtshams su zla ba'i gdan dag la //
T02TD1357E:84b-25: shar lhor sgrol ma nag mo ste //
T02TD1357E:84b-26: lho nub gos dkar mo ni dmar //
T02TD1357E:84b-27: byang shar m'a ma k'i ni dkar //
T02TD1357E:84b-28: byang nub sangs rgyas spyan ni ser //
T02TD1357E:84b-29: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yab //
T02TD1357E:84b-30: yum ni padma'i bzhugs stabs so //
T02TD1357E:84b-31: hi h'i hri hr'i hu h'u hli hl'i ham h'a:/
T02TD1357E:84b-32: de rnams bar brgyad bum par brgyad //
T02TD1357E:84b-33: steng 'og gnyis dang bum dkar bcu'o //
T02TD1357E:84b-34: sgo bzhi nyi ma'i gdan dag la //
T02TD1357E:84b-37: ya:ra:wa:la:/ shar du bgegs dgra brtson 'grus gnag / lho sgor shes rab dzam bha dmar //
T02TD1357E:84b-38: byang du padma nga rgyal dkar //
T02TD1357E:84b-39: nub tu gshin rje rengs ma ser //
T02TD1357E:84b-40: khro bo g-yas brkyang khro mo bzlog / khyams la sems dpa' nyi ma'i gdan //
T02TD1357E:84b-41: aa ae aar ao al aam /
T02TD1357E:84b-42: shar smad nam mkha'i snying po gnag / shar stod kun du bzang po sngo //
T02TD1357E:84b-43: lho smad sa yi snying po dmar //
T02TD1357E:84b-44: byang smad spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar //
T02TD1357E:84b-45: nub smad sgrib pa rnam sel ser //
T02TD1357E:84b-46: lho stod phyag na rdo rje sngo //
T02TD1357E:84b-47: sems ma rnams la zla ba'i gdan //
T02TD1357E:84b-48: a'a aee a'ar aom a'a la a'a:/
T02TD1357E:84b-49: byang stod sgra yi rdo rje ljang //
T02TD1357E:84b-50: shar lhor reg gi rdo rje gnad / lho nub ro yi rdo rje dmar //
T02TD1357E:84b-51: byang shar gzugs kyi rdo rje dkar //
T02TD1357E:84b-52: nub byang dri yi rdo rje ser //
T02TD1357E:84b-53: nub stod chos dbyings rdo rje sngo /
T02TD1357E:85a-2: dbus sngo g-yas dmar g-yon dkar zhal //
T02TD1357E:85a-3: rdo rje gri gug dgra sta g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-4: dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo g-yon //
T02TD1357E:85a-5: dbus nag g-yas dmar g-yon ser zhal //
T02TD1357E:85a-6: ral gri gri gug rtse gsum g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-7: phub dang thod pa kha db'am g-yon //
T02TD1357E:85a-8: dbus dmar g-yas dkar g-yon gnag zhal //
T02TD1357E:85a-9: mda' dang cang te'u lcags kyu g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-10: gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen g-yon //
T02TD1357E:85a-11: dbus dkar g-yas gnag g-yon dmar zhal //
T02TD1357E:85a-12: tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-13: padma me long phreng ba g-yon //
T02TD1357E:85a-14: dbus ser g-yas dkar g-yon sngo zhal //
T02TD1357E:85a-15: 'khor lo dbyug pa rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-16: dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu g-yon //
T02TD1357E:85a-17: yab yum yul la bsams pa ni //
T02TD1357E:85a-18: 'du byed gzugs ni gnyis med yab yum ste //
T02TD1357E:85a-19: 'du shes tshor ba de bzhin no //
T02TD1357E:85a-20: sna dang dri yin mig dang gzugs //
T02TD1357E:85a-21: lce dang ro yin reg dang lus //
T02TD1357E:85a-22: rna ba sgra yin sems dang chos //
T02TD1357E:85a-23: bgegs mthar byed dang rengs byed ma //
T02TD1357E:85a-24: shes rab mthar byed nga rgyal can //
T02TD1357E:85a-25: padma mthar byed rmugs byed ma //
T02TD1357E:85a-26: gshin rje mthar byed brtson 'grus ma //
T02TD1357E:85a-27: yab bzhugs de ru yum 'khyud cing //
T02TD1357E:85a-29: kha khyer mchod pa'i lha mo dang //
T02TD1357E:85a-30: 'dod lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02TD1357E:85a-31: de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1357E:85a-32: shar gyi ro steng padma la //
T02TD1357E:85a-33: ha hi ya yi yadrai hi yu yala'i yam //
T02TD1357E:85a-34: dbus su rgan byad pad 'dab la //
T02TD1357E:85a-35: 'jigs ma drag ma dus mche ma //
T02TD1357E:85a-36: 'bar zhal rlung shugs rab tu gtum //
T02TD1357E:85a-37: drag chen sna chen brgyad kyis bskor //
T02TD1357E:85a-38: zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1357E:85a-39: nag mo gri gug rtsi gsum g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-40: thod pa kha tv'am g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85a-41: shar lho mkha' lding padma la //
T02TD1357E:85a-42: ksh'a ksh'i ya y'i yr'i ksha y'u yl'i y'a: //
T02TD1357E:85a-44: dpal ldan sgyu ma grags ma dang //
T02TD1357E:85a-45: dpal mo dang dpal rgyal rnam rgyal mo //
T02TD1357E:85a-46: rgyal byed dpal ldan 'khor lo can //
T02TD1357E:85a-47: nag mo 'khor lo dbyug to g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85a-49: lho ru ma he padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:85a-50: ha hri ri r'i dri hri ru rli ram //
T02TD1357E:85a-52: keng rus dus mtshan rab khro'i gdong //
T02TD1357E:85a-53: dus kyi lce ma gtsigs ma dang //
T02TD1357E:85a-54: dus ma mi bzad lus ngan ma //
T02TD1357E:85a-55: dmar mo 'byug pa ral gri g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-0: mdung thung lcags kyu @85b g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-1: lho nub rma bya pad steng na //
T02TD1357E:85b-2: ksh'a:kshri r'a r'i rr'e kshr'i r'u rli r'a:/
T02TD1357E:85b-3: lte bar gzhon nu ma 'dab la //
T02TD1357E:85b-4: padma lus med gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1357E:85b-5: ri dgas bdag 'gro rin chen phreng //
T02TD1357E:85b-6: mig bzangs rul ma bzang mos bskor //
T02TD1357E:85b-7: dmar mo mdung thung lcags kyu g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-8: rin chen zhags pa g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-9: byang du khyu mchog pad steng du //
T02TD1357E:85b-10: ham hu wa wi wr'i hu wu wl'i wam /
T02TD1357E:85b-11: lte bar drag mo 'dab ma la /
T02TD1357E:85b-12: dkar mo ga g'a rtag ma dang //
T02TD1357E:85b-13: myur ma dang ni thig le mchog / dpal skyong ser skya nag mos bskor //
T02TD1357E:85b-14: dkar mo rtse gsum cang te'u g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-15: kha tv'am sbrul zhags g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-16: byang shar seng ge padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:85b-17: ksham kshu w'a w'i wr'am kshu w'u wl'i w'a /
T02TD1357E:85b-18: dbus su dpal chen 'dab ma la //
T02TD1357E:85b-19: dkar dpal zla ba'i ri mo dang //
T02TD1357E:85b-20: zla zhal ngang mdog 'dzin ma dang //
T02TD1357E:85b-21: padma'i dbang phyug sgrol ma'i mig / dri med ri bong 'dzin mas bskor //
T02TD1357E:85b-22: dkar mo padma bgrang phreng g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-23: g-yon na me tog rin chen no //
T02TD1357E:85b-24: nub tu glang chen padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:85b-25: h'a hl'i l'a l'i rr'i hl'i l'u ll'i l'am /
T02TD1357E:85b-26: lte bar dbang po'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1357E:85b-27: rdo rje'i 'od dang rdo rje'i lus //
T02TD1357E:85b-28: gser can ma dang 'dod dbang ma //
T02TD1357E:85b-29: ri mo 'dri dang rtsom ma dang /
T02TD1357E:85b-30: zug rdu med ma sgrol ma bzang //
T02TD1357E:85b-31: ser mo rdo rje mda' ni g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-32: dril bu gzhu ni g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-33: byang nub ngang pa padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:85b-34: ksh'a hl'a l'a rri kshl'a lu ll'a l'a: //
T02TD1357E:85b-35: lte bar tshangs ma 'dab ma la //
T02TD1357E:85b-36: gtsang sbra ma dang padma'i mig / chu skyes can dang blo gros ma //
T02TD1357E:85b-37: ngag dbang glu ma klog dran ma //
T02TD1357E:85b-38: ser mo padma dbyug pa g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-39: sbrul dang phub ni g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-40: thams cad rdol pa'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD1357E:85b-41: sgo bzhir steng 'og shing rta la /
T02TD1357E:85b-43: shi sgor gtsug tor byang drag spyan //
T02TD1357E:85b-44: zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog sngo //
T02TD1357E:85b-45: dgra sta rtse gsum g-yas gnyis na //
T02TD1357E:85b-46: sbrul la zhags kha tv'am g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-47: lho ru sngon mo nub sum bha //
T02TD1357E:85b-48: ljang gu gri gug rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD1357E:85b-49: thod pa dril bu g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:85b-50: 'dod log bdun cu rtsa gnyis po //
T02TD1357E:85b-51: kha khyer la gnas mchod pa byed //
T02TD1357E:85b-52: de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1357E:85b-53: shar smad ro steng pad gdan la //
T02TD1357E:85b-54: nya nyi nyari nyu nyali nyam /
T02TD1357E:85b-55: dzha dzhi dzhri dzhu dzhali dzham /
T02TD1357E:85b-56: dzam dzi dzri dzu dzali dzam /
T02TD1357E:85b-57: tsha tshi tshari tshu tshali tsham /
T02TD1357E:85b-58: tsa tsi tsari tsu tsali tsam /
T02TD1357E:85b-59: dbus su bden bral dz'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:85b-60: 'dab mar rim par nya rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:85b-61: nyi rdo rje dang ni nyri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-0: @86a * // nyu rdo rje dang ni nyli rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-1: nyam rdo rje dang ni dzha rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-2: dzhi rdo rje dang dzhri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-3: dzham rdo rje la sogs pa sbyar //
T02TD1357E:86a-4: sa bon rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ming //
T02TD1357E:86a-5: sum cu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1357E:86a-6: nag po ral gri gri gug g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-7: phub dang thod pa g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86a-8: shar lhor sha pa padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-9: ts'a ts'i tsr'i ts'u tsl'i tsa:/
T02TD1357E:86a-10: tsh'a tsh'i tshr'i tsh'u tshli tsh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-11: dz'a dz'i dz'i dz'u dzl'i dz'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-12: dzh'a dzh'i dzhr'i dzh'u dzh'i dzhl'a dzham:/
T02TD1357E:86a-13: ny'a ny'i nyr'i ny'u nyl'i ny'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-14: dbus su rlung lha dzr'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-15: ts'a rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86a-16: nag po dpag bsam me tog g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-18: lho smad lug dang padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-19: na ni nri nu nli nam /
T02TD1357E:86a-20: dha dhi dhri dhu dhli dham /
T02TD1357E:86a-21: da di dri du dli dtham /
T02TD1357E:86a-22: tha thi thri thu thli tham /
T02TD1357E:86a-23: ta ti tri tu tli tam /
T02TD1357E:86a-24: lte bar me lha dhi rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-25: na rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86a-26: dmar po mdung dang dbyug pa g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-27: padma ril ba spyi blugs g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86a-28: lho nub rma bya padma'i steng /
T02TD1357E:86a-29: t'a t'i tr'i t'u tl'i t'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-30: th'a th'i thr'i th'u thl'i th'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-31: d'a d'i dr'i d'u dl'i d'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-32: dh'a dh'i dhr'i dh'u dhl'i dh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-33: n'a n'i nr'i n'u nl'i n'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-34: dbus su gdong drug dhr'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-35: t'a rdo rje sogs sum cu'o //
T02TD1357E:86a-36: dmar po padma mdung thung g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-37: rin po che dang me long g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86a-38: byang smad chu srin padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-39: ma mi mri mu mli mam /
T02TD1357E:86a-40: bha bhi bhri bhu bhli bham /
T02TD1357E:86a-41: ba bi bri bu bli bam /
T02TD1357E:86a-42: pha phi phri phu phli pham /
T02TD1357E:86a-43: pa pi pri pu pli pam /
T02TD1357E:86a-44: lta bar rgya mtsho bri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-45: ma rdo rje sogs sum cu'o //
T02TD1357E:86a-46: dkar po zhags pa rin chen g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-47: klu zhags chu shel g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86a-48: byang shar byi ba padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-49: p'a p'i pr'i p'u pl'i p'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-50: ph'a ph'i phr'i ph'u phl'i ph'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-51: b'a b'i br'i b'u bl'i b'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-52: bh'a bh'i bhr'i bh'u bhl'i bh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-53: m'a m'i mr'i m'u ml'i m'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-54: lte ba tshogs bdag pri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-55: p'a rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86a-56: dkar po dgra sta rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-57: zhags pa rin chen nor bu g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86a-58: nub smad glang chen padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-59: na ni nri nu nli nam /
T02TD1357E:86a-60: dha dhi dhri dhu dhli dham /
T02TD1357E:86a-61: da di dri du dli dam /
T02TD1357E:86a-62: tha thi thri thu thli tham /
T02TD1357E:86a-63: ta ti tri tu tli tam /
T02TD1357E:86a-64: lte bar brgya byin dri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-65: na rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86a-66: ser po g-yas pa rdo rje mda' //
T02TD1357E:86a-67: dril bu gzhu ni g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86a-68: nub byang dang pa padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86a-69: t'a t'i tr'i t'u tl'i t'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-70: th'a th'i thr'i th'u thl'i th'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-71: d'a d'i dr'i d'u dl'i d'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-72: dh'a dh'i dhr'i dh'u dhl'i dh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-73: n'a n'i nd'i n'u nl'i n'a:/
T02TD1357E:86a-74: lte bar tshangs pa dr'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86a-75: t'a rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86a-76: ser po khab dang bgrang phreng g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86a-77: padma ril ba spyi blugs g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86b-0: shar stod @86b mkha' lding padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86b-1: da ngi dri du dli ngam /
T02TD1357E:86b-2: gha ghi ghri ghu ghli gham /
T02TD1357E:86b-3: ga gi gri gu gli gam /
T02TD1357E:86b-4: kha khi khri khu khli kham /
T02TD1357E:86b-5: ka ki kri ku kli kam //
T02TD1357E:86b-6: lte bar khyab 'jug gri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86b-7: da rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86b-8: sngon po 'khor lo dbyug to g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-9: padma lnga skyes dung ni g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86b-10: lho stod ma he padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86b-11: k'a k'i kr'i k'u kl'i k'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-12: kh'a kh'i khr'i kh'u khl'i kh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-14: gh'a gh'i ghr'i gh'u ghl'i gh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-16: lte bar gshin rje gra'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86b-17: k'a rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86b-18: sngon po dbyug pa ral gri g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-19: lcags sgrog zhags pa g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86b-20: byang stod khyu mchog padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86b-21: thka thki thkri ku kli kam /
T02TD1357E:86b-22: sha shi shri shu shli sham /
T02TD1357E:86b-23: sha shi shri shu shli sham /
T02TD1357E:86b-24: pa pi pri pu pli pam /
T02TD1357E:86b-25: sa si sri su sli sam /
T02TD1357E:86b-26: lte bar drag po shri rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86b-27: ka rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86b-28: ljang gu g-yas pa rtse gsum mda' //
T02TD1357E:86b-29: g-yon pa sbrul bcas kha tv'am gzhu //
T02TD1357E:86b-30: nub stod glang po padma'i steng //
T02TD1357E:86b-31: s'a sa'i sr'i s'u sl'i s'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-32: p'a p'a pr'i p'u pl'i p'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-33: sh'a sh'i shr'i sh'u shl'i sh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-34: sh'a sh'i shr'i sh'u shl'i sh'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-35: k'a k'a kr'i k'u kl'i k'a:/
T02TD1357E:86b-36: lte bar gnod sbyin shr'i rdo rje //
T02TD1357E:86b-37: s'a rdo rje sogs sum cu po //
T02TD1357E:86b-38: sngon po rin chen bo con g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-39: ne'u le rgyal pa padma g-yon //
T02TD1357E:86b-40: rdo rje skyil krung phyed par bzhugs //
T02TD1357E:86b-41: shar sgor phag gi shing rta dang //
T02TD1357E:86b-42: lho sgor rta dang byang seng ge / nub sgor glang chen shing rta'o //
T02TD1357E:86b-44: la: wa: ra: ya: / lcags sgrog ma dang dbyug sngon shar //
T02TD1357E:86b-45: nag mo ral gri rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-46: phub dang sbrul zhags g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86b-47: khro gnyer can dang 'dod rgyal lho //
T02TD1357E:86b-48: dmar po mda' dang lcags kyu g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-49: gzhu dang zhags pa g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86b-50: skul byed ma dang mi g-yo byang //
T02TD1357E:86b-51: dkar mo thob ma dung g-yas na //
T02TD1357E:86b-53: 'od zer can dang stobs chen nub //
T02TD1357E:86b-54: ser mo 'khor lo dbyug pa g-yas //
T02TD1357E:86b-55: dung dang rin chen g-yon na'o //
T02TD1357E:86b-56: khro mo'i stabs ni sngar bshad zin //
T02TD1357E:86b-57: kha khyer la ni 'od ldog go //
T02TD1357E:86b-58: rta babs ka ba brgyad kyi 'og //
T02TD1357E:86b-60: hya hy'a hra hr'a hva hv'a hla hl'a /
T02TD1357E:86b-61: nag mo stobs rgyu padma shar //
T02TD1357E:86b-62: dmar mo nor rgyas dung skyong lho //
T02TD1357E:86b-63: dkar po mtha' yas rigs ldan byang //
T02TD1357E:86b-64: ser po 'jog po pad chen nub //
T02TD1357E:86b-65: bdud rtsi bum pa rdo rje g-yas //
T02TD1357E:87a-2: de nas dur khrod ming dang gdan //
T02TD1357E:87a-3: shar du rtse gsum bse yi gdan //
T02TD1357E:87a-4: shar lhor mi bzad bhi ru nda //
T02TD1357E:87a-5: lho ru ro bsreg dom gyi gdan //
T02TD1357E:87a-6: byang du rus sbal g-yag gi gdan //
T02TD1357E:87a-7: byang shar byis shir pha wang gdan //
T02TD1357E:87a-8: nub tu rul ba'i drir seng ge / nub byang rus sbal zos mig sngon //
T02TD1357E:87a-9: de rnams steng du 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1357E:87a-10: kkhgghnga tstshdzdzhnya lwryksha tthddhna lwryha pphbbhma spshshka tthddhna //
T02TD1357E:87a-11: khyi gdong bya rog gdong gdong ma gnag / phag gdong bya rgod gdong ma dmar //
T02TD1357E:87a-12: stag gdong 'ug gdong ma gnyis dkar //
T02TD1357E:87a-13: ci sbyang mkha' lding gdong ma ser //
T02TD1357E:87a-14: phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1357E:87a-15: rol ba'i stabs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1357E:87a-18: phag mo rgya mtsho yab yum mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-19: dbang mo bden bral yab yum mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-20: drag mo me lha yab yum mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-21: khyab 'jug ma dang tshangs ba mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-22: gdong drug ma dang tshogs bdag mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-23: khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-24: gshin rje dang ni chu ma'o //
T02TD1357E:87a-25: nor sbyin ma dang khyab 'jug ma //
T02TD1357E:87a-26: rgya mtsho dang ni gshin rje mo //
T02TD1357E:87a-27: phan tshun 'khyud pa sngar bzhin bshad //
T02TD1357E:87a-28: padma ce sbyang yab yum yin //
T02TD1357E:87a-29: stobs kyi rgyu dang mkha' lding gdong //
T02TD1357E:87a-30: nor rgyas klu dang stag gdong ma //
T02TD1357E:87a-31: dung skyong klu dang 'ug gdong ma //
T02TD1357E:87a-32: mtha' yas klu dang phag gdong ma //
T02TD1357E:87a-33: rigs ldan klu dang bya rgod gdong //
T02TD1357E:87a-34: 'jog po klu dang khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1357E:87a-35: padma che dang bya rog gdong //
T02TD1357E:87a-36: yab yum sngar bshad bzhin du'o //
T02TD1357E:87a-37: gzhan yang dur khrod brgyad po ni //
T02TD1357E:87a-38: ma mo klu dang srin dang bcu //
T02TD1357E:87a-39: phyogs skyong zhing skyong zhing chen gza' //
T02TD1357E:87a-40: ri me lha chen mchod rten dang //
T02TD1357E:87a-41: rnal 'byor dpa' bo brgyad brgyad sogs //
T02TD1357E:87a-42: ro dang ce sbyang dur khrod sogs //
T02TD1357E:87a-43: lo zla zhag dus rgyu skar sogs //
T02TD1357E:87a-44: dga' byed dril rna nag po che //
T02TD1357E:87a-45: bhri dgi ri ti zhing skyong dang //
T02TD1357E:87a-46: pho nya 'phrog ma grub pa sogs //
T02TD1357E:87a-47: bye ba phrag ni phyed dang bzhi'o //
T02TD1357E:87a-48: sngar gyi kha khyer 'dod log ni //
T02TD1357E:87a-49: tsa: tsha: dza: dzha: nya: ta: tha: da: dha: na: pa: pha: ba: bha: ma: ta: tha: da: dha: na:/
T02TD1357E:87a-51: sa: wa: sha: sha: ka: la: wa: ra: ya: ka: kha: ga: gha: nga: hka: ha: ksha:/
T02TD1357E:87b-15: yan lag thams cad 'phrug bzhed ma //
T02TD1357E:87b-16: dri chen dre chu gtong bzhed ma //
T02TD1357E:87b-19: bcings bzhed byis pa khro bzhed do //
T02TD1357E:87b-20: 'dod pa log pa log ma ste //
T02TD1357E:87b-21: gsod log zhe sdang log sogs sbyar //
T02TD1357E:87b-22: thabs kyang shugs kyis shes bar bya //
T02TD1357E:87b-23: gzhan yang zad par bcu dag ni //
T02TD1357E:87b-24: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi ru bsrung //
T02TD1357E:87b-25: gza' bcu gsung gi phyi ru ste //
T02TD1357E:87b-26: bum pa klu dang rab gtum gyi //
T02TD1357E:87b-27: steng 'og lha yang rta babs la'o //
T02TD1357E:87b-28: aom su bi shu ddha dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a b'a tma ko nya ham /
T02TD1357E:87b-29: zhes bya bas lha'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1357E:87b-30: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o /
T02TD1357E:87b-32: // / de nas ye shes gzhug pa ni //
T02TD1357E:87b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag dgyes pa'i mchog / sras bzangs grogs dang 'khor dang rtsa lag bcas //
T02TD1357E:87b-34: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs ni mang pos bskor //
T02TD1357E:87b-35: sangs rgyas yab yum bcas pa dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1357E:87b-37: rang nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1357E:87b-38: rdo rje h'um dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1357E:87b-39: dza: las rdo rje shugs khro bo //
T02TD1357E:87b-40: zhal bzhi phyag ni nyi shu drug / mdog rgyan phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhin //
T02TD1357E:87b-41: nag po ser po'i phyag lhag gnyis //
T02TD1357E:87b-42: glang chen pags pa gyon pa bzung //
T02TD1357E:87b-43: rkang brgyad shing rta la chibs nas //
T02TD1357E:87b-44: chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems //
T02TD1357E:87b-45: lte bar rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1357E:87b-46: bzung la nga ros spyan drang ngo //

T02TD1357E:90b-2: mchod bstod nga rgyal gzud par bya'o //
T02TD1357E:90b-3: mchod pa dang bstod pa'i yan lag ste dgu pa'o /
T02TD1357E:90b-5: // / dpal ldan rdo rje can ni lo dang zla ba dbye ba'i dus kyis dag par 'gyur ro mi dbang kye //
T02TD1357E:90b-6: sems kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin bzhin dbang gis sna tshogs rnam par dag / du ba la sogs rlung rnams dag par rang snying padmar gtso bo'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o //
T02TD1357E:90b-7: drag po nyon mongs sras bcas bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud kyi gtso bo zhabs kyi 'og / dung dang gand'i nor bu ljon pa dag ni de bzhin sku yi rdo rje rdzogs //
T02TD1357E:90b-8: bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis ni bum pa brgyad de rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang sems sogs //
T02TD1357E:90b-9: 'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med rin chen 'byung gnas 'du shes dpag med 'od //
T02TD1357E:90b-10: gzugs ni 'khor lo can te ri bong stobs dang khrag dang dri chu dri chen dag / lha mo drug gi khams rnams kyi ste yul dang yul can gyi ni byang chub sems dpa' sras dang bcas //
T02TD1357E:90b-11: stobs kyis khro bo lnga ste gzhan rnams las kyi dbang po lnga pos so //
T02TD1357E:90b-12: ts'a mu nda la sogs pa thun tshar brgyad kyis padma'i 'dab gnas nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod rnams //
T02TD1357E:90b-13: lha min la sogs zla ba bcu gnyis padma'i 'dab gnas rtsa dang dbugs kyi grangs rnams so //
T02TD1357E:90b-14: klu dang gtum mo gsang ba la ste rgyal po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag / de bzhin 'dod pa la sogs des ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya ba dag / skra yis sgrub pa ma lus dur khrod sa gnas ba sbu rnams kyis 'byung bo'i tshogs rnams so //
T02TD1357E:90b-15: khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //
T02TD1357E:90b-16: sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1357E:90b-17: de nas padma rnam par sbyang //
T02TD1357E:90b-19: h'um gi yi ge rdo rje bcas //
T02TD1357E:90b-20: shes rab la ni mthun phyir ro //
T02TD1357E:90b-21: h'um rigs rang gi yab kyi rdo rje ni ;
T02TD1357E:90b-22: / rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1357E:90b-23: de dbus aa las pad 'dab brgyad //
T02TD1357E:90b-24: de nas rdo rje padmar dgod //
T02TD1357E:90b-25: de nas rnal 'byor h'um phat brjod //
T02TD1357E:90b-26: bsrub cing bde chen bsgom par bya //
T02TD1357E:90b-27: gtum mo lte bar rgyus klu bcom //
T02TD1357E:90b-28: ho yis ye shes dbus nas su //
T02TD1357E:91a-2: / phung khams skye mched la sogs bsregs //
T02TD1357E:91a-3: ri bong spyi bo las 'bab pa //
T02TD1357E:91a-4: thig le'i gzugs te rdo rje can //
T02TD1357E:91a-5: gnas bzhi rim bcas slar steng 'og / rgyan ldan me long gnas lta bur //
T02TD1357E:91a-6: dus gsum ye shes rang 'byung ba //
T02TD1357E:91a-7: gsung dag ye shes 'bar bar gcig / dung can rgyan chen gtum mor brjod //
T02TD1357E:91a-8: lte steng rigs dan dh'u t'i'i sna //
T02TD1357E:91a-9: srog lnga sna rtser yungs kar bzhugs //
T02TD1357E:91a-10: srog 'gags stong nyid ma bcos dang //
T02TD1357E:91a-11: de la yid gzhag bsgom par bya //
T02TD1357E:91a-12: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a bu a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1357E:91a-13: rnam dag dran pa'i thig le dang //
T02TD1357E:91a-14: phra mo bsgom pa'i yan lag ste bcu ba'o /
T02TD1357E:91a-16: // / de nas nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1357E:91a-17: bsgom pas skyo na sngags bzlas te //
T02TD1357E:91a-18: las la shis pa'i phreng ba bzung //
T02TD1357E:91a-19: sngags kyi sgra spangs grogs po ru //
T02TD1357E:91a-20: gang 'gyur ba yi sngags de bzlas //
T02TD1357E:91a-21: aom na mo badzra sa tv'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-22: na mo buddha bo dhi sa tva bhya:/
T02TD1357E:91a-23: na mo badzra kro dhe ndra r'a dze bhya:/
T02TD1357E:91a-24: na mo bi shra m'a tree /
T02TD1357E:91a-25: na mo bu ddha bo dhi sa tva de b'i bhya:/
T02TD1357E:91a-26: na mo badzra d'a ki n'i bhya:/
T02TD1357E:91a-27: aom na mo bha ga wa te k'a la tsa kr'a ya badzra bhee ra ba bh'i k'a r'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-28: ma he ndra n'i la barnna sha r'i r'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-29: m'a ra kle sha hri d'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-30: kr'a nta si ta ra kta tsa ra n'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-31: kri shn'a rakta si ta kanth'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-32: n'i la si ti p'i ta rakta dam sht'a kar lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-33: kri shan ra kta si ta sa bye tar skandh'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-34: dv'a da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-35: shta bim sha ti ka r'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-37: tri sh'u la k'a rti ka / b'a na aom ku sha da ma ru ka / mudgar /
T02TD1357E:91a-43: kha tv'am ga / ka p'a la /
T02TD1357E:91a-51: shi ro ga dza tsarmi dhri ka ka r'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-52: bya ghra tsarma ni bas n'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-53: skandhe mu nda m'a la aa ba lam bi ne /
T02TD1357E:91a-55: badzra patta ma ku te badzra ka m'a la m'a la aardha tsandra dha r'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-56: kunda la ru tsaka / kanthi k'a /
T02TD1357E:91a-59: bha sma yadznyo pa b'i ta shi ro ma ni /
T02TD1357E:91a-60: mah'a mu dra n'a gendra bi bh'u sha n'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-61: badzra d'a ki n'i santo shi ta hri da y'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91a-62: aindra aagni ya ma nee rri tya ba ru na b'a yu ku be ra a'i sh'a na braham beshnu bi n'a ya ka k'a rti ka ya nan di ma h'a k'a la gra ha /
T02TD1357E:91a-63: naksha tra kshe tra pa'a la su rendr'a su rendr'a phe nendra bh'u tandra na re ndra sam stu ta tsa ra n'a ya /
T02TD1357E:91b-0: aom a'a: h'um @91b ho: ham ksha: hkshmlwryam k'a la tsakra dur d'a na ta da ma ka dza ta dza r'a ma r'a n'anta ka / tree lo kya bi dza ya: ma h'a bi re shva ra /
T02TD1357E:91b-18: badzra kro dha r'a dz'a dhi pa ti /
T02TD1357E:91b-20: badzra d'a ki n'i dz'a la pa ri bra ti /
T02TD1357E:91b-23: badzra sa tva dzny'a y'a sarba m'a ra bi ghn'am bi n'a ya ka kinna ri kam bu ru sha ga ru da gandha rba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta ma h'a pre ta /
T02TD1357E:91b-24: kum bhanda aa p'a sm'a ra /
T02TD1357E:91b-28: du shu t'a ga gra h'a da yo yo sarba dzva ra /
T02TD1357E:91b-30: kshu dro pa dra ba k'ar ni: sarba sa tv'a n'am sarb'a pa k'ar ra t'am st'an sarbanydza:/
T02TD1357E:91b-31: sh'i ghram badzra ku she n'a kri shyi kra shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-33: di shi ga t'a n'a kri shy'a kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-34: b'urma di shi ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-35: dakshi na de shi ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-36: autta ra di shi ga t'a n'a kri shy'a kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-37: bashtsi ma di shi ga t'a n'a kri sh'ya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-38: b'a ya bya di shi ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-39: a'i sha na de shig t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-40: nee rri tya de shi ga t'a n'a kri shy'a kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-41: aagan di shi ga t'a na' kri shya kri shya /

T02TD1357E:91b-46: to yi mandala ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-47: pra thb'i mandala ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /

T02TD1357E:91b-49: r'u pa dh'a tu ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-50: aa r'u pa dh'a tu ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /

T02TD1357E:91b-58: panytsa karma ndri ya ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-59: panytsa karma ndra ya bi sha ya ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-60: sarba to ya tra ku tra dtsitta ga t'a n'a kri shya kri shya /
T02TD1357E:91b-61: ma h'a sma sh'a na badzra gni dzva li ta bh'a myam ni pa ta ya ni pa ta ya /

T02TD1357E:91b-65: badzra khdga ne na krinta ya /
T02TD1357E:91b-66: badzra tri sh'u le na bhe da ya bhe da ya /
T02TD1357E:91b-67: badzra kartta ka ya ha na ha na /
T02TD1357E:91b-68: badzra p'a ni na bindha bindha /
T02TD1357E:92a-2: badzra mudga re n'a ko ta y'a ko ta y'a /
T02TD1357E:92a-3: badzra tsakra na tstshe da ya tstshe da ya /
T02TD1357E:92a-4: badzra kunte na bhi nda bhinda /
T02TD1357E:92a-5: badzra dande na t'a da ya t'a da ya /
T02TD1357E:92a-6: badzra bar shu na tstshi nda tstshi nad /
T02TD1357E:92a-7: s'a rdha tri ko ti banda kri tva sham sh'a na bh'u te bhyu te bhyo bi lam ku ru ku ru /
T02TD1357E:92a-8: badzra da ma ru ke na badzra da ki n'i r'a b'a ha ya /
T02TD1357E:92a-9: badzra d'a ki n'i bhyo m'a ra k'a yi k'a n'am ru dhi ram ni be da ya be da ya /
T02TD1357E:92a-10: pnyts'a mri tam ni ri n'a bhya:/
T02TD1357E:92a-11: banytsa mri tam ni be da ya /
T02TD1357E:92a-12: sarba badzra d'a ki n'i sa hi ta /
T02TD1357E:92a-13: sarba sa tv'a n'a na sh'anti kam //
T02TD1357E:92a-14: booshta kam raksh'a ba ra na gu pti ku ru ku ru h'um h'um phat /
